content: @Alex Crichton what command can I run in wasmtime to reproduce the error in https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/8563?
@Eric Huss cargo +nightly test -Zfeatures=all -p wiggle-macro, although you'll need to comment out the doctest = false workaround in crates/wiggle/macro/Cargo.toml
ah, I was wondering how that crate was involved since its tests were turned off.
love the name of this :joy:
